Today we learn about Data Visualization in python with library matplotlib.pyplot,seaborn and plotly. First of all **what is Data Visualization ?**
   **Data Visualization** is the representation of data or information in a graph, chart, or other visual format. It communicates relationships of the data with images. It allows trends and patterns to be more easily seen. It make Machine algorithm easy to understand. Data visualization is not only help for data scientists and data analysts it help in the  finance, marketing, tech, design, or anything. you need to visualize data.
source.e8b846ad: **Pie Chart:-** Pie Chart can only display one series of data. Pie charts show the size of items in one data series, proportional to the sum of the items. The data points in a pie chart are shown as a percentage of the whole pie

There are more library flies liks seaborn,and plotly. Seaborn aims to make visualization a central part of exploring and understanding data. Its dataset-oriented plotting functions operate on dataframes and arrays containing whole datasets and internally perform the necessary semantic mapping and statistical aggregation to produce informative plots.Seaborn is a library for making statistical graphics in Python. We have various type of visualization in the both seaborn and matplotlib.
